channel.title: Can someone explain how to "read" hex?
channel.description: So I've got WPE all set up, and I'm trying to understand how someone would decide what means what (correctly), and how to find object IDs and such through reading the code sent + received in the packets. Links that are retard proof would be very much appreciated as well! (So no wikipedia, since I barely understood that)
